caption.p: Summary of important investigations and prognostic factors [ 17, 25].

tr.td: Hemogram, CRP, Troponin, ferritin, D-dimer, creatinine, Liver function tests
CRP, Interleukins:IL-6, IL-4, IL-10, and tumor necrosis factor (TNF)-α.
High D-Dimer, ferritin and CRP; neutrophil-to-lymphocyte ratio ≥3.13, lymphopenia, thrombocytopenia
VT, SVT, AF, myocarditis, pericarditis, fibrin in specimen, heterophile antibodies.

fn.p: AF-Atrial fibrillation, VT-ventricular tachycardia, SVT- Supra ventricular tachycardia, CRP- C-reactive protein, AF- Atrial fibrillation.
